name: @porsche-design-system/js
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.start: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_DEV=1 yarn build; fi && yarn start:app
scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:components-manager-core && yarn build:components-manager-cli && yarn build:components-wrapper && yarn build:partials && yarn build:app && yarn build:cleanEnvironment
scripts.build:app: yarn build:app:base && yarn build:app:components && yarn build:app:assets && yarn build:app:table-data
scripts.build:components-wrapper: yarn build:components-wrapper:environment && yarn build:components-wrapper:webpack && yarn build:components-wrapper:cm && yarn build:components-wrapper:replaceCdnBaseUrlDynamicPlaceholder && yarn build:components-wrapper:generateChunksManifest
scripts.replace: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_INITIAL_STYLES-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-js/partials").getInitialStyles())') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" public/index.html > public/index.tmp.html && rm public/index.html && mv public/index.tmp.html public/index.html
scripts.test: yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt && yarn test:cbt
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,e2e' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 30000 http-get://localhost:8575 && ts-node --project tests/e2e/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/e2e/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:vrt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,vrt' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 30000 http-get://localhost:8575 && ts-node --project tests/vrt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/vrt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:cbt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,cbt' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 30000 http-get://localhost:8575 && ts-node --project tests/cbt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/cbt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:unit: yarn test:unit:components-manager-core && yarn test:unit:components-wrapper && yarn test:unit:partials
scripts.clean:build: yarn clean:app:build && yarn clean:components-wrapper:build && yarn clean:components-manager-core:build && yarn clean:components-manager-cli:build && yarn clean:partials:build
scripts.clean:node_modules: yarn clean:app:node_modules && yarn clean:components-wrapper:node_modules && yarn clean:components-manager-core:node_modules && yarn clean:components-manager-cli:node_modules && yarn clean:partials:node_modules
